name: myth
description: myth is the only Discord bot you'll ever need. It has powerfull latest features which can manage discord server. It contains latest discord features like buttons, forms, menu, etc
feature1: fun, It can play different kinds of fun minigames and more.
feature2: Moderation, It has many moderation command with latest discord fetures like timeout.
feature4: Ticket, It is very easy to pull the ticket and close it. It has buttons to make more easy to use.
